en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryTitle: Your {{ case.divorceWho }} has not admitted to committing adultery
en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryTheFact: The court needs to be sure that adultery took place for it to be used as the reason for divorce (legally known as the 'fact').

en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryYouCanRead: You can read your {{ case.divorceWho }}'s response on the next page.
